points.name: 286 -320 million years old human skeleton found in Macoupin, Ill., USA
points.description:
Name286 -320 million years old human skeleton found in Macoupin, Ill., USA
DescriptionIn December of 1862, the following brief but intriguing report appeared in a journal called The Geologist: In Macoupin county, Illinois, the bones of a man were recently found on a coal-bed capped with two feet of slate rock, ninety feet below the surface of the earth...The bones, when found, were covered with a crust or coating of hard glossy matter, as black as coal itself, but when scraped away left the bones white and natural. The coal in which the Macoupin County skeleton was found is at least 286 million years old and might be as much as 320 million years old.

Source: Michael A. Cremo and Richard L. Thompson, The Hidden History of the Human Race, Bhaktivedanta Book Publishing, 1996
PlaceMacoupin, Illinois, USA
CountryUnited States

points.name: Alien-like Belt clip
points.description:
NameAlien-like Belt clip
DescriptionIn the Museum of Natural History in Leipzig, a curious artifact lies in a display case among all sorts of archaeological finds and ceramics from past millennia.
This is an alleged belt buckle or belt hook with a human figure.
The object is labeled as a belt hook of Celtic origin. It shows a figure with typical Celtic twisted neck ring, according to the Natural History Museum. Accordingly, a member of the Celts from Central Germany.
Disturbing here, however, are the huge and elongated eyes of the Celt and certainly also the filigree body. No human being looked or looks like this. Well, however, the alleged extraterrestrials look so similar, which are described by UFO witnesses and recently Hollywood. One calls them today generally as Little Greys or Greys.
PlaceNatural History Museum Leipzig
CountryGermany

points.name: Carved stones collection of Professor Javier Cabrera
points.description:
NameCarved stones collection of Professor Javier Cabrera
DescriptionThe thousands of engraved stones of the collection show incredible motives. Humans together with dinosaurs, Surgeries on the heart of open bodies, unexplainable maps with rivers and coast lines. Often accused to be falsifications of the present day, analysis of geologists have found out, that the engraving of some incredible motives lie under a oxidation layer which is many thousands years old. As a surgeon, Cabrera operated on poor Indians who could not afford to pay for the medical procedure. They thanked
with dusty figurines and engraved stones, which Cabrera himself originally classified as fakes. Until the year 1966 Cabrera did not care about archaeology at all. But he received more and more of these strange stones. Asking back the local Indios, they only told him, that they are out of underground depots, which have to be kept secret - otherwise they would be destroyed by the officials. The more intensively Cabrera studied his collection of curiosities, the more suspicious he became. And the story became even more complicate, as the the forger Basilo Uschuya had confided to a journalist named Andreas Faber-Kaiser that the engraved stones were genuine except for the few hundred that he had imitated to sell to tourists. However, he would always publicly claim that everything was fake. Asked why he was playing this fake game, Uschuya replied: If I sell stones with real, old engravings, I have to deal with the local Indians, and they cant take a joke when it comes to their cultural heritage. Plus, Im going straight to jail. Cabrera, unsure of what was ancient and what was modern, took four stones that he suspected must be old and had two surveys done. The first was done by geologist Dr. Eric Wolf of the Mauricio Hochschild mining company in Lima, and the second by the Facultad de Minas of the Lima Technical University (signed on behalf of the faculty by Dr. Fernando de la Casa and Dr. Cesar Sotillo). Both expertises confirmed the great age of the engravings. This statement was possible because the engravings were covered by a fine but natural oxidation layer, which must be many millennia old. In 1976 Erich von Däniken visited Dr. Cabrera together with the chief designer of NASA at that time, Joseph Blumrich. He gave them four samples of ancient and modern engravings. Photos under the microscope proved the glaring difference between the false and the genuine engravings.
PlaceIca
CountryPeru

points.name: Ancient galvanic battery
points.description:
NameAncient galvanic battery
DescriptionThe National Museum in Baghdad, Iraq, displays a device consisting of a terra-cotta vase, eighteen centimters high, with a bronce and metalic inlay construction. Acid was found on the bottom of the vase. Ingenieurs could proof that this was a primitive battery with the calvanic principle.
PlaceBagdad
CountryIraq

points.name: Ark of the covenant
points.description:
NameArk of the covenant
DescriptionWhere is the Ark of the Covenant?
By Erich von Däniken

The God of the Bible gave his servant Moses instructions to build an ark. You can read about it in the 2nd Book of Moses from chapter 25, where it also says: And take care that you make everything exactly according to the model that is to be shown to you on the mountain. So there was an original, the model, and a copy made by Moses.

But the ark was dangerous. Only specially trained priests, the Levites, were allowed to operate it. In connection with it, several deaths are recorded in ancient Jewish literature. After many aberrations, the Ark of the Covenant arrived in the Temple of Jerusalem. There it was stolen by a son of King Solomon, and taken to Ethiopia in a flying chariot. In faraway Ethiopia, the Queen of Sheba ruled, and she had an intimate relationship with Solomon. All this can be read in the Ethiopians Book of the Kings: Kebra Nagast.

When also in Ethiopia 3000 soldiers died because they came too close to the Ark of the Covenant, the Queen of Sheba had the Ark buried deep in the ground. Today, the Chapel of Mary in the city of Axum stands on the same spot. (Coptic Church) Ethiopian tradition reports that the contents of the Ark were divine and not made by human hands. It would be time to open the lid again and find out more about its origin.
PlaceChurch of the holy Mary
CountryEthiopia

points.name: Arkaim - Skeleton with elongated Skull
points.description:
NameArkaim - Skeleton with elongated Skull
DescriptionThis Skeleton of a Woman with an elongated Skull was discovered in Arkaim in 2015. The Skeleton was dated to be from the 2nd or 3rd Century AD. Scientists claim that the elongation of the Skull was done by tribal and ritual headbinding but what was the inspiration of these ancient cultures to elongate their skull? Strangely, the Skeleton seems to be much younger in Date (250 AD) than the Arkaim-Site (1,700 BC) itself.
Also make sure to check out the other mysterie entries on RAMAR about other elongated skulls that have been found around the globe.
PlaceKazakh Steppe, Bredinsky District, Chelyabinsk Oblast, Russia
CountryRussia

points.name: Betz Mystery
points.description:
NameBetz Mystery
DescriptionFort George Island, Florida: In March 1974, the Betz family found a strange metal sphere in their yard and believed it was a historic cannonball from Florida’s colonialisation. But the sphere was clean, free of corrosion, and shiny.

When the family took the sphere home, they said, it started to behave by itself. Their accounts were of the sphere rolling by itself, making noises, and vibrating.

From Wonderful Engineering:

Terry, the son of Antoine and Gerri Betz, was playing guitar and found that the sphere reacted to the sound of the guitar and made a throbbing noise which scared the family dog. Things took an even odder turn when they were sitting on the floor and rolling the sphere towards one another. When it was sent in one direction, it would change direction midway and head back to the person who rolled it.

All this attention to the Betz sphere alerted NASA as well. Their initial studies showed that the steel sphere was not manufactured or tampered with.

Military officials asked for the sphere to be taken back to their labs for further research and the Betz family declined. The Military, doing what they do best, seized the sphere and took it with them. The sphere was brought to Jacksonville Naval Air Station and X-rays could not penetrate to the center. They also found out that it could withstand 120,000 pounds of pressure per square inch.

Excerpts of https://wonderfulengineering.com/betz-sphere-makes-place-inexplicable-wonders/
PlaceFort George Island, Florida
CountryUnited States

points.name: Carved Stone Balls
points.description:
NameCarved Stone Balls
DescriptionThese petrospheres date back to 3.500-1.500 B.C., 450 of them have been found so far, most of them in Scotland, Aberdeenshire. Their size is about 7cm in diameter, so they fit in the palm of a hand. Although the stone balls have nearly the same size, the design and material varies widely. There are carved stone balls that have nearly no decoration, some have knobs and others are highly decorated.
The most elaborate is the Towie Stone, it is decorated with sacred symbols such as spirals. Some of the stones are made out of very hard material such as diorit, some are made out of sandstone, which is good to work on. There are many ideas about their purpose, reaching from hunting projectiles, weights, oracles, status icons and so on. A very interesting idea is that they could represent the 5 platonic solids (Keith Critchlow Time Stands Still: New Light on Megalithic Science). They could have been used to study spherical geometry. Or could these stones be charged (different material) and used to measure telluric energy or used as healing stones? Could the different spirals symbolise different telluric currents? So much questions and till now, no answer. It remains a mystery.
PlaceTowie Aberdeenshire Scotland
CountryUnited Kingdom

points.name: Charama Rock Paintings
points.description:
NameCharama Rock Paintings
DescriptionThe Chhattisgarh state department of archeology and culture found 10,000-Year-old Rock Paintings depicting Aliens and UFOs in Charama-Region in the Kanker-District in tribal Bastar region.
There are several Beliefs among the local People. Some worship the Paintings, others narrate Stories they have heard from their Ancestors about Rohela People (the small sized ones) who used to land from the Sky in a round shaped flying Object. According to this Legend, they even took away one or two Persons of the Village who never returned.

An interesting story in this regard happened in July 2014 when state Agriculture and Fisheries Minister Ramkrishna Kusmaria stated that he spotted an UFO in Sukha village in Damoh district, about 275 km east of state capital Bhopal, while on an official tour.
Source: https://www.hindustantimes.com/bhopal/mp-minister-says-ufo-damaged-crop/story-SmiVi4tx3JvmgxDNsCVtsO.html

Scientists and researchers are, as like with many other mystery topics, heavily debating the topic of the depiction of extraterrestrial beings in ancient rock art, petroglyphs and figurines. More research in this area is definitively needed and we at RAMAR will do our best to research these topics even further in a serious and scientific manner.
PlaceCharama, Chandeli, India
CountryIndia

points.name: Collection of elongated skulls
points.description:
NameCollection of elongated skulls
DescriptionThe elongated skulls are a world wide phenomenon. A great collection you can find in the Juan Navarro Museum in Paracas, Peru. Fascinating is the fact, that some of those do not have any fontanel. But as we know, every baby needs the fontanel to get out of the mothers womb. Analyses showed, that the DNA of some skulls are the same as from the region of the black sea.
PlaceParacas, Juan Navarro Museum
CountryPeru

points.name: Disc of Sabu
points.description:
NameDisc of Sabu
DescriptionThis mysterious object can be found in the Egyptian Museum of Kairo. The Sabu disc is an object from the 1st dynasty, ca. 3000 to 2800 B.C., which was found in 1936 in the Mastaba S3111 in the north of the necropolis Sakkara. It has been found in the tomb of the ancient Egyptian official Sabu, after whom the object is also named. The function and meaning of the carefully crafted natural stone vessel is still unclear. Officially it is said to have been a vase. Interesting is the fact, that it is made from schist, but schist is a layered stone, which easely breaks, so how have the constructors carved this object, and for what purpose it was build? A vase...?!? There are several different theories about it. It has 61cm in diameter and a maximal hight of 10 cm.
Its official catalogue number is JE71295“.
Walter B. Emery noted in his excavation report: No satisfactory explanation has yet been found for the strange design of this object. Visually, the foreign body resembles a steering wheel, a kind of propeller or a ships propeller. But what is such a modern thing doing in a 5000-year-old tomb?
PlaceSakkara
CountryEgypt

points.name: Dogu Figurines Japan
points.description:
NameDogu Figurines Japan
DescriptionDogū, literally earthen figure are small humanoid and animal figurines made during the later part of the Jōmon period (14,000–400 BC) of prehistoric Japan. According to the National Museum of Japanese History, the total number found throughout Japan is approximately 15,000. Dogū were made across all of Japan, except Okinawa. The purpose of the dogū remains unknown.
Gottfried Bonn mentions the following in the magazine Sagenhafte Zeiten Issue No. 2/2018: Some of the figures wear a device similar to sunglasses or diving goggles. Vaughn M. Greene shows thirty aspects of the Dogu statues used in modern NASA space suits: Lenses, rivets, belt, quick release, headphones, rubber sleeves, helmet, etc. His summary: There is no way a prehistoric tribe could have known such technology unless they were visited from space by beings from another planet. To support his thesis, Greene cites Japanese legends of Shinto mythology and ancient traditions that mention visitations by beings from heaven.
Erich von Daniken also wrote about the Dogu-figurines in his best-selling first book Chariots of the Gods.

The mystery of these figurines lies within the fact that they seem to incorporate a knowledge of technology that was far ahead of its time. Where did the ancient japanese cultures get the inspiration to create these enigmatic figurines in the first place? Did they see or encounter beings that looked exactly like the ones they depicted with these figurines?
PlaceTokyo National Museum, Japan
CountryJapan

points.name: Giant hand axes in Syria
points.description:
NameGiant hand axes in Syria
DescriptionArchaeologists dug out from the ground in Sasnych (6 km from Safita in Syria) hand axes weighing 3.8 kg.
PlaceSasnych
CountrySyria

points.name: Dragon monolith in Villa Hermosa, Mexico (Monument 19)
points.description:
NameDragon monolith in Villa Hermosa, Mexico (Monument 19)
DescriptionThe picture speaks for its own. A helm wearing human being, sitting in the feathered/flying serpent. It is called the dragon monolith. Dragons all over the world are heavenly creatures - maybe machines in the sence of Cargo cults. In China the dragons brought the first rulers from the skies to earth.
PlaceVilla Hermosa
CountryMexico

points.name: Dropa stones
points.description:
NameDropa stones
DescriptionThe Dropa stones are a complex topic in the community of mystery researchers. Many famous researcher have tried to solve the case or trace back facts and sources of evidence etc..

If you intend to understand how complex this topic is please visit the blog of Lars Fischinger, the link is provided under links in this mystery file of RAMAR (You may have to translate the page into English).

To make to whole story a bit shorter two excerpts of two different information sources are provided that are classified as an authentic source. The first one is from Eric von Danikens book Return to the stars in 1969. The second source is from ISRPPA homepage (International Society for the Research and Preservation of Paranormal Artifacts).

Summary from Eric von Daniken Return to the stars (Excerpt is limited due to the length of text):
Kassantsev reported especially about the strange findings in the Chinese mountain massif Baian Kara Ula. A story that seems like a fairy tale. Now this is Kassantsevs report: It was in 1938 when the Chinese archaeologist Tschi Pu Tei discovered in the mountain caves of Baian Kara Ula in the Chinese-Tibetan border area some row graves. He found small skeletons of beings with diminutive physique, which nevertheless possessed rather large skulls. On the walls of the caves he discovered petroglyphs depicting beings with round helmets. The celestial bodies, the sun and moon, were also carved into the rocks and
connected by bundles of pea-sized dots. Tschi Pu Tei and his helpers were able to find, and this is the sensational thing, 716 plates of granite rock. Plates that are two centimeters thick and look very much like our long-playing records. These stone plates have a hole in the center, from which a double-tracked grooved writing spirals lead out to the edge of the plate.
The Chinese archaeologists knew that in this deserted area the the Dropa and Kham (Sikang) tribes had once lived in this deserted area. And of these hill tribes anthropologists said that they had been had been of small stature, growing to an average height of only 1.30 meters tall.... ...Dr. Vyacheslav Saizew just published now excerpts from the stone plate report in the magazine Sputnik. The report is kept in the Beijing Academy and in the Taipei Historical Archives of Taipei in Formosa.
And what is so explosive and shocking about the Stone Plate Report?
The report is only exciting and strange for those who are reluctant to look at new perspectives of our ancestry. The dropa stone report claims that, going back from today, 12,000 years ago a group of their people were transported to the third planet of this system. Their air vehicles - that is an exact translation of the grooved hieroglyphs - would not have had enough power or strength to leave this world again. They would have been in the in the mountains, which are far away and difficult to access.
Means and possibilities to build new air vehicles would not have existed ... .... Are there any additions that corroborate the stone plate report in its real content? There are the row graves, the petroglyphs, and the stone plates themselves. But there are also the Chinese sagas, which come precisely from the the Baian Kara Ula area and narrate of small spindly yellow creatures who descended from the clouds. The myths also narrate that the alien creatures were avoided by the Dropas because of their ugliness, and that they were killed by the men nimble creatures .

Excerpt form ISRPPA:
In 1938, an archeological expedition led by Dr. Chi Pu Tei into the Baian-Kara-Ula mountains of China made an astonishing discovery in some caves that had apparently been occupied by some ancient culture. Buried in the dust of ages on the cave floor were hundreds of stone disks. Measuring about nine inches in diameter, each had a circle cut into the center and was etched with a spiral groove, making it look for all the world like some ancient phonograph record some 10,000 to 12,000 years old. The spiral groove, it turns out, is actually composed of tiny hieroglyphics that tell the incredible story of spaceships from some distant world that crash-landed in the mountains. The ships were piloted by people who called themselves the Dropa, and the remains of whose descendents, possibly, were found in the cave.

According to Dr. Tsum Um Nuis translations, one of the lines of the hieroglyphs read,

The Dropas came down from the clouds in their aircraft. The men, women and children of the neighboring peoples (Ham) hid in the caves ten times before sunrise. When at last they understood the sign language of the Dropas, they realized that the newcomers had peaceful intentions....

Another section of the writings expressed regret by the Ham tribe that the aliens spaceship had crash-landed in such a remote and inaccessible mountains and that there had been no way of building a new one to enable the Dropas to return to their own planet. In the years since the discovery of the first disk, archeologists and anthropologists had learned more about the isolated Bayan-Kara-Ula area. Much of what they learned seemed to corroborate the bizarre story recorded on the discs. Legend still preserved in the area spoke of small, gaunt, yellow faced men who came from the stars, long, long ago.

Current Location
There are no completly intact stones known to remain in existance. The disks were supposedly stored in several museums in China. None of these museums report any traces of these disks, nor can any be found of those supposedly sent to USSR for analysis. In a museum in Cen, south of Guangzhou, a man informed of these disks inquired to the curator and photographed a display resembling the disks. However, the disks in the Cen museum disappeared from their display shortly after the photographs were taken.
Placebaian kara ula
CountryChina

points.name: El Baul stele, Guatemala
points.description:
NameEl Baul stele, Guatemala
DescriptionBeing with helmet and exhaust in front of the nose. In the helmet you can see clearly, a human face. From the closed helmet, there is a tube leading to a box on his back. Is it cargo cult, or what did the artist try to show. Officially it is called to be a ball player, but therefore the helmet would be extremely disturbing and the view would be limited.
PlaceEl Baul
CountryGuatemala

points.name: Giant hand axes in Morocco
points.description:
NameGiant hand axes in Morocco
DescriptionThe over dimensional hand axes found in Ain Fritissa (Eastern Morocco) are very interesting, because useless for our ancestors: 32 cm long - 22 cm wide - 4.2 kg heavy. If we assume the normal constitution of man, beings who could deal with such clumsy devices must have been about 4 meters tall. We have many indications in literature and findings, that giants once really existed on our planet.
PlaceAin Fritissa
CountryMorocco

points.name: Footprints on a fossilized sandy beach in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, USA
points.description:
NameFootprints on a fossilized sandy beach in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, USA
DescriptionIn November 1938, Professor Doctor Burroughs, a geologist at Berea College in Berea, Kentucky, published an article in the college magazine. In it he claimed that together with some colleagues he had found traces of beings on a fossilized sandy beach in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, USA, which must have been human-like. Burroughs: The footprints are impressed into the horizontal surface of a hard, massive gray sandstone. There are three pairs of tracks showing impressions from the left and right feet...each footprint has five toes and a pronounced arch.

The site of the find, along with the footprints, was authenticated by several experts. Geologist Prof. C. Gilmore confirmed that the prints were in a rock layer that definitely belonged to the Carboniferous era. This was flatly impossible. The age of Carboniferous the was some 320 million years in the past, and at that time there could have been no human-like creatures that also walked on two legs. An ethnologist noted, probably the footprints were carved into the ground by an indigenous tribe. So the prints were examined microscopically. The images showed grains of sand between the toes and on the heels that were more closely packed together than the grains next to the feet. This proved the pressure of the body on the heels and the toes. Moreover, the images under the microscope showed no traces of any artificial processing. Nevertheless, all the expert anthropologists declared that the prints must be fakes because bipeds did not exist in the Carboniferous era. The June 1939 magazine wrote: We admit that we do not know exactly how the tracks were made, but we do know that one creature could not have been, and that is man in the Carboniferous. And in the journal a Dr. Albert Ingalls scoffed: Asking a scientist about man in the Carboniferous is like asking the historian about diesel engines in ancient Sumer. Science knows that these prints are not from a man in the Carboniferous unless 2 and 2 are 7 or the Sumerians would have had airplanes and radios.

Source: Burroughs, W.G.: Human like footprints, 250 million years old. In: The Berea Alumnus, Berea College, Kentucky. November 1938
PlaceRockcastle County, Kentucky, USA
CountryUnited States

points.name: Geigerles Lotterbett
points.description:
NameGeigerles Lotterbett
DescriptionThis rock made of middle red sandstone (rubble sandstone formation) is not particularly large with a dimension of 2 by 3 meters. It is its shape that makes it protrude from the thousands of red sandstone rocks of the same size in the Black Forest.
The rock Geigerles Lotterbett is located in the Nagoldtal immediately south of the junction of the Teinach valley on a mountain spur that protrudes from the west into the Nagoldtal and forces the Nagold into a large loop. The Calw-Nagold railway line crosses the mountain spur in a tunnel. The Waldeck castle ruins are located at the end of the mountain spur directly above the Nagold.
The shape of the rock Geigerle Lotterbett has given rise to numerous stories. In the 12th century the following story arised:
The shape of the rock is derived from a legend according to which a poor musician who could not raise the money for an overnight stay in the inn. And so from time to time I slept in this rock.
One day he wanted to help a woman who was trying to release her husband, who had been kidnapped in the Waldeck keep.
However, the lady of the castle rode him down. With the words Here you have your loosen bed
his body had been placed in the rock niche.

The forest witches tried for years to bring the musician back from the realm of the dead through a ritual. But this ritual never worked. So the witches tried the ritual one last time, on January 6th.
On this day the witches made it, they brought the musician back from the realm of the dead. But it is still said today that something went wrong with the ritual, the musician came back with special powers and with a good sense for intruders.
The musician was so grateful to the witches that he would do anything they could wish for.
The witches council decided that they urgently needed a guard to protect the ruins and the witches.
And so the Waldeck witches created the ruins guard.
He watches over the witches, the ruins and the whole forest.

You can reach the rock Geigerles Lotterbett from above, from the plateau near Neubulach, and from below, from the Nagoldtal.
From Altbulach you drive slightly downhill on the K 4304 in the direction of Nagoldtal. At the edge of the forest there is a playground and a parking lot, called Rastplatz Wasen. From there, the yellow diamond of the Black Forest Association leads 0.8 kilometers and with a difference in altitude of 120 meters on a path that is partly steeply down to the Geigerle rest area.
PlaceGeigerle's Lotterbett rock near Neubulach.
CountryGermany

points.name: Golden air planes
points.description:
NameGolden air planes
DescriptionThe so called Golden Flyers which are exhibited in the gold museum of Bogota, Columbia. They were found in ruler tombs around in Tierradentro. Official archaeologists declare them as replicas of birds or insects. Have you ever seen a bird with a vertical tail? Two engeneers, friends of Erich von Däniken, reconstructed the model with motor and propeller - and these air plane imitations are aerodynamic and do fly. We call it Cargo-Cult. One model became the symbol of our Research Organisation A.A.S. (Erich von Däniken and Giorgio Tsoukalos always wear the logo on TV and Interviews) In the gold museum of Bogota are hundreds of such items exhibited.
PlaceAlto de Segovia - Parque Arqueológico de Tierradentro
CountryColombia

points.name: Golden Hats
points.description:
NameGolden Hats
DescriptionThere are 4 mysterious Golden Hats found at different times and places. But they are all about the same size, shape, and design which connects them together. They are dated back to the Bronze Age.
1. The Golden Hat of Schifferstadt, 1.400 B.C., height 29,6 cm
2. Avanton Gold Cone, 1.000 - 900 B.C., height 55 cm
3. Golden Cone of Ezelsdorf/Buch 1.000 - 900 B.C., height 88 cm
4. Berlin Gold Hat 1.000 - 800 B.C., height 75 cm.
Each hat is made out of one piece of gold, worked into a thin sheet with fine ornaments, a very elaborate craftsmanship. What was the purpose of these hats? Did they have a sacred ceremonial funktion? As research has shown the ornamentation reveals astronomical knowledge. With these hats one could determine the sun and lunar year. So they knew about the order of heaven, earth and time. There are other finds in Europe which have the same ornamentation: Comerford Crown, Ireland and the Axtroki Hats, Spain.
PlaceSchifferstadt
CountryGermany

points.name: Goldflyer - ancient imitations of modern aircrafts
points.description:
NameGoldflyer - ancient imitations of modern aircrafts
DescriptionIn Tierra Dentro and several pre-Colombian tombs were found hundreds of gold figurines - dated around 500 BC. The shape of the so called Gold Flyers remember exactly to a today’s airplane. Officially the shall represent birds or insects, but there are no birds with vertical tails. Referring to the Ancient Astronauts Theory its cargo cult. Two German engineers Peter Belting and Algund Eenboom reconstructed a remote controlled aircraft with the original mass conditions. It was aero dynamic and flew! How could the people at that time know about aerodynamics? Its today’s symbol of the Ancient Astronaut Research Society. (A.A.S.)
PlaceAltos De Segovia, Cauca, Kolumbien
CountryColombia

points.name: Great Godess Figurines and Vessels
points.description:
NameGreat Godess Figurines and Vessels
DescriptionAlready discovered in 2012 - 2013, but not made public until now, there was an elaborate excavation near the town of Kapitan Andreewo in Bulgaria where a large, late neolithic religious complex was found. The archaeological team came across a total of 482 different structures dating back from the late Neolithic to the middle ages. The discoveries were made on a plot with an area of 600 square meters.
The discoveries were made by a team led by Prof. Vasil Nikolov and assist. Prof. Victoria Petrova, with Tanya Hristova and Peter Leshtakov as their deputies, all of them, archeologists from the National Institute and Museum of Archeology in Sofia.
However, the most intriguing findings were the objects and artefacts on the archeological site, namely strange figurines and vessels which have a great similaty to other extraterrestrial looking artefacts that have been found on other locations around the globe. Especialy the huge, almond-shaped eyes and very thin and small nose. There are strange mythological symbols carved onto the Objects as well.

Here we have to same questions like with many other figurines created by ancient cultures like the japanese Dogu-figurines, the figurines of the Vinca culture or the figurines of the ancient chinese Sanxingdui culture and many others. What inspired the artisans and craftsmen of ancient cultures to create figurines that look so strange to our modern eyes? Did they encounter such beings in reality or did they probably see these beings in dreams or drug induced states? No one knows for sure but it s very intriguing that we can find similar figurines and depictions in ancient cultures around the globe.
PlaceKapitan Andreewo
CountryBulgaria

points.name: Hopi Tribe Reservation - Kachinas
points.description:
NameHopi Tribe Reservation - Kachinas
DescriptionKatchinas are still today the heavenly teachers/brothers of the Hopi tribes. The Hopi pass down their tradition from generation to generation, in their ceremonies and arts.
PlaceHopi Reservation
CountryUnited States

points.name: Ishango Bone
points.description:
NameIshango Bone
DescriptionThe Ishango bone was found in 1950 by Belgian Jean de Heinzelin de Braucourt while exploring what was then the Belgian Congo. It was discovered in the area of Ishango near the Semliki River. The artifact was first estimated to have originated between 9,000 BC and 6,500 BC. However, the dating of the site where it was discovered was re-evaluated, and it is now believed to be more than 20,000 years old (between 18,000 BC and 20,000 BC).
The Ishango bone is on permanent exhibition at the Royal Belgian Institute of Natural Sciences, Brussels, Belgium.

The etchings on the bone are in three columns with marks asymmetrically grouped into sets, leading to various tantalizing hypotheses such as that the implement indicates an understanding of decimals or prime numbers. Though these propositions have been questioned, it is considered likely by some scholars that the tool was used for simple mathematical procedures or to construct a numeral system.

Also, during earlier excavations at the Ishango site in 1959, another bone was also found. It is lighter in color and was scraped, thinned, polished, and broken on one end, revealing it to be hollow. The artifact possibly held a piece of quartz like the more well-known bone or it could have been a tool handle. The 14-cm long bone has 90 notches on six sides, which are categorized as major or minor according to their length. Jean de Heinzelin interpreted the major notches as being units or multiples and the minor notches as fractions or subsidiary. He believed the bone to be an interchange rule between bases 10 and 12. Interestingly enough, the summerian and the babylonian numerical systems also used a Sexagesimal system like the numerical system on the Ishango-bones.

How could ancient people more than 20000 years ago have developed such an advanced mathematical and numerical sytem and even know about prime-numbers?
PlaceIshango
CountryDem. Rep. Congo

points.name: Klerksdorp spheres
points.description:
NameKlerksdorp spheres
DescriptionThe Klerksdorp spheres are metallic spherical objects, some with precise equatorial grooves and up to 10cm in diameter, that have been collected by miners and rockhounds from ~3 billion year old pyrophyllite deposits near Ottosdal, South Africa.

In 1979 an arcticle published by Barritt proposed these objects are of artificial origin, as had been researched and stated by Paul V Heinrich in 1996. Claims exist from various researchers as Barritt, M. Cremo, Brenda Sullivan, Roelf Marx (Curator of the Klerksdorp Museum) or Erich von Däniken, that these objects are an anomaly and of artificial origin deriving from an extinct civilization or even extra terrestrial aliens, crafted by unknown technology. Roelf Marx even stated that one of the spheres even levitated and rotated by itself.

On the other hand also scientific reports exists like from Pope & Cairncross, Paul V. Heinrich or Nel, who stated these objects are a product of a geological phenomenon after their analysis. Please read the provided link to the scientific report of Heinrich for your investigations and personal opinion of this case.

Both parties present facts or informations which cant be neglected and can be regarded as legit if you believe in the credibility of the sources.

Excerpt from the book The Hidden History of the Human Race in 1998 from M. A. Cremo & Richard I. Thompson:
GROOVED SPHERE FROM SOUTH AFRICA

Over the past several decades. South African miners have found hundreds of
metallic spheres, at least one of which has three parallel grooves running around its equator.
According to an article by J. Jimison, the spheres are of two types — one of solid bluish
metal with white flecks, and another which is a hollow ball filled with a white spongy
center. Roelf Marx, curator of the museum of Klerksdorp, South Africa, where some of
the spheres are housed, said: The spheres are a complete mystery. They look man-made,
yet at the time in Earths history when they came to rest in this rock no intelligent life
existed. Theyre nothing like I have ever seen before.

We wrote to Roelf Marx for further information about the spheres. He replied in a
letter dated September 12, 1984: There is nothing scientific published about the globes,
but the facts are: They are found in pyrophyllite, which is mined near the little town of
Ottosdal in the Western Transvaal. This pyrophyllite is a quite soft secondary mineral with
a count of only 3 on the Mohs scale and was formed by sedimentation about 2.8 billion
years ago. On the other hand the globes, which have a fibrous structure on the inside with a
shell around it, are very hard and cannot be scratched, even by steel. The Mohs scale of
hardness is named after Friedrich Mohs, who chose ten minerals as references points for
comparative hardness, with talc the softest (1) and diamond the hardest (10).

In his letter to us, Marx said that A. Bisschoff, a professor of geology at the
University of Potchefstroom, told him that the spheres were limonite concretions.
Limonite is a kind of iron ore. A concretion is a compact, rounded rock mass formed by
localized cementation around a nucleus.

One problem with the hypothesis that the objects are limonite concretions concerns
their hardness. As noted above, the metallic spheres cannot be scratched with a steel point,
indicating they are extremely hard. But standard references on minerals state that limonite
registers only 4 to 5.5 on the Mohs scale, indicating a relatively low degree of hardness.
Furthermore, limonite concretions usually occur in groups, like masses of soap bubbles
stuck together. They do not, it seems, normally appear isolated and perfectly round, as is
the case with the objects in question. Neither do they normally appear with parallel grooves
encircling them.

For the purposes of this study, it is the sphere with three parallel grooves around its
equator that most concerns us. Even if it is conceded that the sphere itself is a limonite
concretion, one still must account for the three parallel grooves. In the absence of a
satisfactory natural explanation, the evidence is somewhat mysterious, leaving open the
possibility that the South African grooved sphere — found in a mineral deposit 2.8 billion
years old — was made by an intelligent being.
PlaceOttosdal
CountrySouth Africa

points.name: Legends and Mysteries of the Aborigines Australia
points.description:
NameLegends and Mysteries of the Aborigines Australia
DescriptionThe Aborigines talk about the so called Dreamtime but a more precise translation would be Time of the Gods. The aboriginal word Altjiranga (Gods) was confound by researchers with the word Altjirérinja (Dream). Many of the aboriginal legends have similarities with the legends of many other ancient cultures around the globe. For example, the Aborigines also have a legend about a prehistoric flood. Also, the Aborigines have many legends about Gods, so called Wandjinas that came from the sky to teach the young human-race about culture and art and science. There is also an interesting legend from the Great Sandy Desert area in the northern part of Western Australia comes a story that explains how the Wolfe Creek Crater, or Kandimalal, was created by a star falling from heaven, creating a crater in which a Rainbow Serpent took up residence, though in some versions it is the Serpent which falls from heaven and creates the crater. (Source: Sanday, Peggy Reeves (2007). Aboriginal Paintings of the Wolfe Creek Crater: Track of the Rainbow Serpent. Philadelphia: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology). Interestingly, the serpent is sometimes ascribed with a having crest or a mane or on its head, or being bearded as well (Source: Brandenstein (1982), p. 64) which is very similar to descriptions and depictions of Quetzalcoatl, the feathered serpent in the Aztec Culture.
Another legend from of the Aborigines tells the following story:
The Yolŋu people of northern Australia say that the constellation of Orion, which they call Julpan (or Djulpan), is a canoe. They tell the story of three brothers who went fishing, and one of them ate a sawfish that was forbidden under their law. Seeing this, the Sun-woman, Walu, made a waterspout that carried him and his two brothers and their canoe up into the sky. Source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Australian_Aboriginal_astronomy
There are other aboriginal legends that feature a similar theme:
The Wirangu people of the west coast of South Australia have a creation story embodied in a songline of great significance based on the Pleiades. In the story, the hunter (the Orion constellation) is named Tgilby. Tgilby, after falling in love with the seven sisters, known as Yugarilya, chases them out of the sky, onto and across the earth. He chases them as the Yugarilya chase a snake, Dyunu. The Boonwurrung people of the Kulin nation of Victoria tell the Karatgurk story, which tells of how a crow robbed the seven sisters of their secret of how to make fire, thus bringing the skill to the people on earth. Source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Australian_Aboriginal_astronomy

There are many depictions of strange beings and objects in the aboriginal rock-art and petroglyphs which look a lot like modern extraterrestrials and ufos. The great mystery of these rock arts lies in the fact that no one can say with certainty what our ancient ancestors wanted to illustrate with the pictorial representations of these mysterious beings. Where did our ancestors get the inspiration to depict these beings? What did they want to tell us and can we find clues and hints in the ancient aboriginal legends?
PlaceAboriginal Territories
CountryAustralia

points.name: London Hammer, Texas
points.description:
NameLondon Hammer, Texas
DescriptionThe London Hammer (also known as the London Artifact) is a name given to a hammer made of iron and wood that was found in London, Texas in 1936. Part of the hammer is embedded in a limy rock concretion, leading to it being regarded by some as an anomalous artifact, asking how an obviously man-made tool could come to be encased in a 400 million year old rock.
PlaceLondon, Texas
CountryUnited States

points.name: Lycurgus Cup
points.description:
NameLycurgus Cup
DescriptionThe Lycurgus Cup is a very mysterious ancient artifact with a possible greek or roman origin. Scientists date the cup to 290–325 AD. The early history of the cup is unknown but certainly Lionel de Rothschild owned it by 1857 and in 1862 Lionel lent it to an exhibition at what is now the Victoria and Albert Museum, after which it virtually fell from scholarly view until 1950. In 1958 Victor, Lord Rothschild, sold it to the British Museum, where it is on display ever since.

The mystery of the cup lies within the glass material that it s made of. To be precise, dichroic glass, which shows a different colour depending on whether or not light is passing through it: red when lit from behind and green when lit from in front. It is the only complete Roman glass object made from this type of glass, and the one exhibiting the most impressive change in colour. This effect is achieved by making the glass with tiny proportions of nanoparticles of gold and silver dispersed in colloidal form throughout the glass material. Even on the Wikipedia website it s stated: Quote: The process used (to create this type of glass) remains unclear!

How could an ancient culture possess the knowledge of nanoparticles and also know how to use it to achieve this effect?
PlaceBritish Museum
CountryUnited Kingdom

points.name: Machine of Antikytera
points.description:
NameMachine of Antikytera
DescriptionThis mechanism was found in wreck near the island of Antikytera in 1900. Many years in the cellars of the Greece National Museum in Athens, it was completely cleaned and learned about the complicate mechanisms, including differential gears.
PlaceAntikytera, near
Countrynull

points.name: Medieval Painting in the Visoki Decani monastery depicting two UFOs
points.description:
NameMedieval Painting in the Visoki Decani monastery depicting two UFOs
DescriptionThe UFO paintings on monastery Visoki Decani
(Serbia,Kosovo).

The monastery Visoki Decani was built between 1327 and 1335 by the Serbian medieval king Stefan Decanski of Serbia and was dedicated to the Ascension of the Lord. The monastery is settled in the picturesque valley of the Bistrica river surrounded by the mountains and forests of the Prokletije mountain range It is the largest and best preserved medieval monastery in Serbia. During its turbulent history the Monastery was an important spiritual centre with developed artistic and intellectual activities. Although the monastery buildings suffered damage from the Turkish occupation, the church has been completely preserved with beautiful 14th century fresco paintings.

The main picture shows a fresco entitled The Crucifixion of Christ and was painted in 1350. Two objects with figures inside can be in the top left and top right of the fresco. Enlargements of these objects are shown above. The fresco is located above the altar at the Visoki Decani monastery in Kosovo, Serbia. The angel top left shows a bright female personification while gesturing to the Sun. The opposite shows a dark personification on the other side of the Moon. This juxtaposition of light and dark, positive and negative, Yin and Yan is central to interpretation of picture as representing mans redemption through Christs death.

The meaing of the symbols in the picture are heavily debated in the scientific community and the true interpretation of these images is still very controversial.

Dragana Van de moortel-Ilic mentions in her research-paper that on the Serbian television Pink news broadcast of 7 December 2009, witnesses stated that they spotted unidentified flying objects in the sky above Novi Sad, resembling lights in the shape of triangles. The screen showed images of ‘the crew’ from the monastery Visoki Deani while the narrator quoted Miroslav Kostic, the president of the UFO association, claiming that many people saw these lights, yet nobody saw the crew of these flying objects. However, public enthusiasm for the idea that those images represent visitors from space has not yet diminished or disappeared.
PlaceDecani
CountryKosovo

points.name: Mica chamber in Teotihuacan
points.description:
NameMica chamber in Teotihuacan
DescriptionNear to the sun pyramid, there is a chamber (3x1x0.5meters ) isolated with mica. Why did they need such a special chamber, what was the purpose? Has it something to do with the mercury which they also found here and in other central american ancient cities. A mica chamber would be the best storage place for mercury - mercury was described in old Indian Sanskrit text as one part of the Vimana-fuel...
PlaceTeotihuacan, Mexico
CountryMexico

points.name: Mirror in the Mausoleum of Jimmu Tenno -1st Japanese Emperor
points.description:
NameMirror in the Mausoleum of Jimmu Tenno -1st Japanese Emperor
DescriptionThe first emperor of Japan used a magical mirror in which he could see what happens all around the islands of his empire. After his dead, the mirror was buried with him. What kind of mirror was that? Every year, the Shinto priests roll a new cloth around it, since hundreds of years.
PlaceMausoleum of emperor Jimmu Tenno - Yamatotakada
CountryJapan

points.name: Moeraki Beach - stone balls
points.description:
NameMoeraki Beach - stone balls
DescriptionSince thousands of years the coast rocks give birth to big stone balls. How does that work with solid rock?
PlaceMoeraki
CountryNew Zealand

points.name: Nebra sky disc
points.description:
NameNebra sky disc
DescriptionThe Nebra sky disc is one of the oldest representations of the sky. It dates back to 1.600 B.C and was found by treasure hunters in 1999 on the Mittelberg in Saxony-Anhalt. On top of the mountain there has also been an prehistoric enclosure. The disc is about 30 cm in diameter and is made out of bronze (cupper from Austria) with gold (from Cornwall/United Kingdom) symbols such as the sun, crescent and stars. There is a group of seven stars which could represent the Pleiades. Later two arcs and a sun barge were added. The Nebra sky disc is the oldest known portable astronomical instrument showing the yearly course of the sun and the summer and winter solstices. In Saxony-Anhalt there are also older earthworks such as the Goseck Solar Observatory and Pömmelte Woodhenge (Sky Paths of Saxony-Anhalt). So here we have another proof of the extraordinary astronomical knowledge our ancestors had long time ago. A knowledge which was worldwide, a knowledge which outlast time connecting us with the past.
PlaceNebra
CountryGermany

points.name: Over 2000 years old chrome-plated sword in China
points.description:
NameOver 2000 years old chrome-plated sword in China
DescriptionIn the book of Hartwig Hausdorf „Das chinesische Roswell“ hes writting about two over 2000 years old dated chrome-plated swords he found in a museum in the chinese province of Xian.

In western science chromium has not been invented until the year of 1797 by the french pharmacist and chemist Louis Nicolas Vauquelin. Further more Robert Wilhelm Bunsen (1811-1899) invented the process to produce chromium in its pure form only in the year of 1854.

The picture and report of Hartwig Hausdorf clearly show, that these swords are chrome-plated and dated over 2000 years old.

Contrary to our western history of science and established inventions the Chinese did already know about the technology how to produce chromium. In the book „Das chinesische Roswell“ and „Nicht von dieser Welt“ of Hartwig Hausdorf also other profound artifacts exist contrary to mainstream science acctepted invention years of certain technology.
PlaceOver 2000 years old chrome-plated sword in China
CountryChina

points.name: Padre Crespi Collection - Unknown inscriptions
points.description:
NamePadre Crespi Collection - Unknown inscriptions
DescriptionQuote from EvDs book: History is wrong!

For fifty years, the Catholic diocese was looked after by a certain Father Carlo Crespi. He enjoyed a reputation as a friend of the Indios and even during his lifetime the folk of Cuenca regarded him as a saint. Father Crespi died in 1982 and the people built a monument in his name that is, to this day, decorated every day with fresh flowers. What was so special about this padre? He listened to the Indios: for hours, or even days if need be. He won their trust and helped them out in all sorts of difficult situations.
The Indios expressed their gratitude by showering gifts upon the kindly preacher. Religious artifacts of the kind that aren’t exactly approved of by the Catholic Church; artifacts that their families had kept hidden from the white men for hundreds of years. Father Crespi initially placed the objects against the wall of his inner courtyard. But as their number increased, he was forced to start piling them up in a shed behind the church. The flow of gifts, however, didn’t let up and Crespi was forced to open up two further rooms in which he piled up some of the most amazing treasures that I have ever seen. Pictures 7–12 Scientists have never really thoroughly examined Father Crespi’s treasures.
PlaceCuenca
CountryEcuador

points.name: Puff the Magic Dragon pictograph from Wupatki
points.description:
NamePuff the Magic Dragon pictograph from Wupatki
DescriptionIn his great book “Earth Epochs” John Jensen Jr. shows an image of the Puff the Magic Dragon pictograph from Wupatki. The depiction looks like a dragon creature spitting fire. This petroglyph must be extremely old. Though there is no certain way to date such petroglyphs, it is believed to be at least several hundred years old. Did dragons maybe really exist? Here an excerpt from John Jensen Jr.s book about this dragon:
This petroglyph can be seen at the Wupatki National Park near Flagstaff,
Arizona. It has been named “Puff, The Magic Dragon!” I have no idea
whether some dinosaur could in fact breathe fire, but I am more inclined
to be open minded than skeptical, because I am assuming the premise
that the artists of these examples are representing something they
encountered. Fire breathing dragons are a worldwide construct of magic-
myth for nearly all cultures.

Fran Barnes, a recognized authority on rock art of the American South-West, writes, In the San Rafael Swell, there is a pictograph that looks very much like a pterosaur, a Cretaceous flying reptile (Swift, Dennis, Messages on Stone, Creation Ex Nihilo, vol. 19, p. 20)
PlaceWupatki
CountryUnited States

points.name: Relief disc - Illustrated embryological growth phases
points.description:
NameRelief disc - Illustrated embryological growth phases
DescriptionThe relief on the 22 cm large, black lydite stone disc (2 Kg.), is concepted like a comic strip. Front and back sides are showing pictures and symbols, which are from medics approved growth phases of an human embryo. The disc was dated to 500 BC and dedicated to the Misca-Culture. The authenticity of its age was confirmed in 2001 at the Natural History Museum in Vienna, Austria. A falsification is out of question.
Placeunsure, outside Bogota in the ground of a Finca
CountryColombia

points.name: Roman Dodecahedron
points.description:
NameRoman Dodecahedron
DescriptionRoman Dodecahedrons are small hollow objects ( 4 to 11cm) most made out of copper with 12 pentagonal sides, each side has a hole with different diameter. 100 of these Dodecahedrons have been found mostly in Europe ( especially Germany and France) at Gallo-roman sides. They date back to the 2nd - 4th century CE. There are no records of these objects so the purpose is still unknown. The Dodecahedron is one of the five platonic solids, it stands for the element ether. Did they have an astronomical function? Or were they used to measure distances. A relatively new theory is that the Dodecahedrons were used for knitting gloves. It is a very wide range of possibilities, but we still dont know.
PlaceZweibrücken
CountryGermany

points.name: Rongorongo - writings on wooden tablets
points.description:
NameRongorongo - writings on wooden tablets
DescriptionThere still remains the riddle of the writing. At one time, some of the statues wore small wooden tablets around their neck. Two of them are exhibited in the anthropological museum of Santiago de Chile. The engravings show a certain affinity with the writing of Mohenjo-Daro, an ancient Indus Valley civilization (modern day Pakistan). Only the dating does not fit. The settlement of Easter Island is thought to have occurred about 350 AD.
Mohenjo Daro is dated back to 3000 BC and was whipped out by an atomic explosion.
PlaceEaster Island
CountryChile

points.name: Singing stone block in Abu Sir
points.description:
NameSinging stone block in Abu Sir
DescriptionA stone block located in the temple ruins of Abu Sir hides another mystery. Each point you knock on the block sounds different. How can one stone block resonate in different frequencies?
PlaceAbu Sir
CountryEgypt

points.name: Square-Faced Mummy with name Pachery or Nenu of Egypt
points.description:
NameSquare-Faced Mummy with name Pachery or Nenu of Egypt
DescriptionThis mummy comes with a face that is interwoven strips of linen that make up the concentric square design over the mummy’s face. The body is allegedly remarkably well-preserved. According to the Louvre, x-rays revealed that the mummy was an adult male that lived in the Ptolemaic Period (305 BC to 30 BC). The museum researchers are not sure of the man’s name, but they believe it is either Pachery or Nenu. The question here is, this seems to be the only mummy today which comes with this square face design. Why did he want his face to be interwoven by squares?
PlaceLouvre Museum Paris
CountryFrance

points.name: Strange Geode with metallic structure inside - Coso Artifact
points.description:
NameStrange Geode with metallic structure inside - Coso Artifact
DescriptionA strange spherical rock that was found on February 13, 1961, 6 miles north-east of Olancha at the edge of the Amrgosa desert in California. At the time, like Yikesell, Wallace Lane, and Virginia Maxey were looking for minerals and were particularly on the lookout for geodes. The three owned a souvenir shop in Olancha, and they knew very well that geodes could be sold for a lot of money. This is because there are magnificent crystals inside a geode. About 120 meters above Owens Lake, the three discovered an irregularly shaped geode and laboriously hauled their find home. The next day, Mike Mikesell wanted to saw the rock in half to get to the crystals on the inside. As always, he used a diamond saw. Suddenly the saw snapped. A new saw blade suffered the same fate. Now the hard-working finders suspected that there might be a particularly valuable mineral inside the geode, perhaps even a diamond. They finally succeeded in splitting the geode in half with a great deal of effort and the assistance of a hammer and chisel. Their surprise could not have been greater: The outer skin consisted of a layer of sea fossils. This was followed by a layer that reminded them of petrified wood. Finally, there were two rings of a porcelain-like material, which in turn contained a plain pin 2 millimeters in diameter and 17 millimeters in length. That is what had broken the diamond saw. Geologists, none of whom want to reveal their name, estimate the age of the geode at about 500,000 years.
PlaceOlancha, California
CountryUnited States

points.name: The Manna Machine
points.description:
NameThe Manna Machine
DescriptionDescription of the Manna machine from exceprt of George Sassoons Text in the magazine Sagenhafte Zeiten Issue No. 2/2002:
The Manna Machine is mentioned in the book entitled The Kabbalah Unveiled by S. L. MacGregor Mathers which was first published in London in 1887 and has been reprinted and purchased ever since. It is a translation of various parts of the Sohar, an ancient Jewish mystical work, and it contains for the most part descriptions of an entity known as The Ancient of Days. According to Gershom Scholem, the worlds foremost expert on Kabbalah, the Sohar was originally written around 1290 by Moses de Leon, a Spanish Jew. The Sohar circulated in the Jewish community since then in manuscript and later in printed form.
The Ancient of Days consisted in principle of three skulls, an outer one containing two others within it, one of which sat on top of the other. In the center of this arrangement was the main lamp with a brightness that exceeded any brightness. The object had a beard whose hair grew out of one part of the face and back in at another; no body is mentioned, but there is a strong right arm, there are six feet, and between them two testicles and a penis. A substance known as dew or the oil of the great deity ran down from the upper part of this object to be collected in the testicles and finally to run out of the penis. Eventually, some possible clues to the function of this Ancient of Days were found. He did not speak, did not move by himself, was carried through the desert and placed on various thrones that had to be dismantled to the next transport. We learn that its function was to produce manna. Couldnt it have been some kind of machine?
The next question now is: Would it be possible to construct such a machine to produce a basic food using our current know-how - or a possible extrapolation? George Sassoon, Rodney Dale, and Martin Riches suggested that a manna-like substance could be obtained by intensive cultivation of some microscopic aquatic plants such as chlorella, a type of pond weed that reproduces extremely rapidly under appropriate environmental conditions. The main requirements for growth for Chlorella-like organisms are: Water, carbon dioxide, nitrogen and light. As for water, the upper part of the Ancient of Days consists of a surface that could extract water even from the dry air of the Sinai Desert, accumulating as dew; carbon and nitrogen would be available from the atmosphere and could be obtained for culture by circulating through the whiskers (tubes) in contact with the air through a semipermeable membrane. As for light, son the Sohar repeatedly mentions the main lamp inside the old one. Furthermore, of course, energy is required. Assuming an Israelite population of 600 families, one arrives at an amount of about 500 kg per day, which would be within the capacity of a small nuclear reactor. Such a reactor could easily convert nuclear energy into light energy, e.g., by using a neutron-charged laser light. Heat would thus also be produced, so that thermoelectric methods of obtaining electricity for controls and other auxiliary functions would be available. In turning algal sludge into edible manna, a cooking process must have been involved, for which the excess heat could be used, as well as for burning waste products. These waste products were secreted from the nose of the Ancient of Days, an exhaust pipe that caused the column of smoke and fire seen above the tabernacle when the machine was in operation.

With todays technology, it would be absolutely possible for us to produce such a machine to obtain a superfood from algae. But where did the ancient Jewish communities get this high-tech knowledge from or were even in possession of such a machine?
PlaceSinai Desert, Israel
CountryEgypt

points.name: The map of admiral Piri Reis
points.description:
NameThe map of admiral Piri Reis
DescriptionThe Piri Reis map was found at renovation works in the Topkapi-Palace in Istanbul. The map is dated with 1519, but Admiral Piri Reis explains in the text, that he built this map out of many much older maps, which he received in Alexandria/Egypt. The map contains the coast line of the Antarctic, including islands and parts of South America. Who was able to map a coast line, which lies under kilometers of ice since millennia?
PlaceTopkapı-Palast, Fatih/Istanbul, Turkey
CountryTurkey

points.name: The mysterious AIUD-Object
points.description:
NameThe mysterious AIUD-Object
DescriptionThis technical looking like object was found in 1973 - In 10 meters dept of a sand bank on the Mures river in Romania in a gravel pit. It was caked together with a Mastodon bone and a tooth. These animals died out approximately 10 000 years ago. Two laboratories have analysed the elements of the object and found out that it consists of 94-97% of aluminium. We know how to produce and work aluminium since 200 years. What it could be still resists a mystery.
PlaceOriginally found close to Aiud
CountryRomania

points.name: The Woman of Tlailotlacan, Elongated Skull
points.description:
NameThe Woman of Tlailotlacan, Elongated Skull
DescriptionIn Tlailotlacan, in the Teotihuacan area, archaeologists have excavated the skeleton of an upper-class Woman with an elongated skull. Also, two round Pyrite-Stones were encrusted into her top front teeth. She also has a prostethic Tooth made of a green Stone called serpentine. The Skull is believed to be 1600 Years old. She was buried with 19 jars of offerings.

Elongated Skulls have fascinated Palaeo-SETI researchers for a long time. However, contrary to the public perception, it is not the statement of the paleo-SETI experts that the elongated skulls must necessarily have an extraterrestrial origin, because it is known that many ancient cultures elongated their skulls using a technique known as fronto-occipital compression likely done with a cradleboard. The big question is, what inspired the ancient cultures to do so. Why did they use this technique to elongate their skulls?
If it was possibly an ideal of beauty, where did the view that elongated skulls were considered beautiful come from? Could it be that our ancient ancestors actually encountered gods who had such elongated skulls and people wanted to conform to this ideal through this technique of skull elongation?
PlaceTeotihuacan
CountryMexico

points.name: Tomb plate of Pacal, Palenque
points.description:
NameTomb plate of Pacal, Palenque
Description7 meters under the foundation of the temple of inscriptions (Templo de las inscriptiones) lies a triangular door with a cave behind. In that cave which was discovered full of stalactites and stalagmites a 10 tons heavy plate is lying – 2.2 x 3.8 meters. The tomb plate is covered with a mysterious chiselling. Pacal is sitting in a kind of frame, similar to the Stupas on Buddhism temples in Asia. Many suggested explanations were made since the 1950s. Erich von Daniken suggested in his first book Chariots of the Gods, an image of a misunderstood technology, which shows Pacal in his vehicle to the stars. Today’s best Maya Epigraphs Stuart&Stuart (father and son) now explained all the symbols with the cosmological understanding of the Maya. Pacal is no more falling into a mystical earth monster, rather leaving this planet to the firmament.
PlacePalenque, Chiapas, Mexico
CountryMexico

points.name: Trade routes over all oceans - millenia ago
points.description:
NameTrade routes over all oceans - millenia ago
DescriptionDr. Dominique Görlitz is an experimental archaeologist and the expedition leader of the ABORA-Projects, among many other researching programs. He is a PhD geobotanist and experienced anthropologist.
In 1976 French scientists prove the occurrence of tobacco leaves and even the South American tobacco beetle in the mummy of Ramses II. Dr. Svetlana Balabanova proved by forensic tests the occurrence of New World alkaloids for mummification purposes in more than 3.000 Egyptian mummies. Dr. Görlitz wrote his doctor thesis about the out of place plants and artefacts, which must have been traded specifically over the oceans.
In 1992 Dominique Goerlitz discovered the Lee-Board-Sailing-Technique on rock drawings in Upper Egypt dating from approximately 5,500 years ago. These lee boards were used as a keel on modern yachts. They allow the raft to sail across and even against the wind. In four big reed boat expeditions he experimentally proved the functionality of these lee-board for tacking across and against the wind. So, he already sailed with his reed boats across the North Atlantic, Mediterranean and Black Sea.
Vanilla, pineapple, cocain, tobacco - including pipes - Agave and many more relicts have been found in Middle East, Africa and Europe. How did they get here? A coincidental travel over thousands of miles over the oceans is not possible for certain reasons, which Dr. Görlitz explains in his thesis. Find the link below:
ABORA is to find answers to this question and many more.
PlaceABORA Headquarters
CountryGermany

points.name: Vinča culture
points.description:
NameVinča culture
DescriptionThe Vinča culture, also known as Turdaș culture or Turdaș-Vinča culture, is the oldest Neolithic culture in South-eastern Europe, dated to the period 5,500–4,500 BC

Vinca culture figurines have been researched numerous times and some researchers have come to the conclusion that these mysterious ancient objects found in Serbia could depict extraterrestrial visitors in ancient times, similar to the Dogu-figurines of ancient Japan and other depictions of the so called gods that are mentioned in the legends of other cultures around the world! It s still a mystery why many ancient cultures created such intriging looking figurines which do not resemble people of that time but seem to depict strange beings or gods. What was their motivation in doing so?
PlaceVinca
CountrySerbia

points.name: Voynich Manuscript
points.description:
NameVoynich Manuscript
DescriptionThe Voynich Manuscript, also known as the worlds most mysterious book, was discovered 1912 by Wilfrid Voynich (Villa Mondragone, Frascati, Italy, Society of Jesus). It is dated to the early 15th century. The Manuscript is written in an unknown language which could not be deciphered up till today. There are 240 remaining pages with handwriting text and coloured illustrations. Through the illustrations the Voynich Manuscript can be grouped into six parts: Herbal, Astronomical, Balneoligical, Cosmological, Pharmaceutical, Recipes. Today the book is in Yale Universitys Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library. The Manuscript stays a mystery. Who was the writer and what unknown language he was using ?
PlaceFrascati
CountryItaly
